title: Narrow All Caps Sans from Transistor - Reveal (video game) Trailer
content:
There's a fairly unique looking R, and the H is very wide. Scope the trailer here, they use the typeface throughout the title sequence:

[http://www.gamespot.com/transistor/videos/transistor-reveal-trailer-6405...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011163746/http:/www.gamespot.com/transistor/videos/transistor-reveal-trailer-6405556/?hd=1 "http://www.gamespot.com/transistor/videos/transistor-reveal-trailer-6405556/?hd=1")

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011163746im_/http:/s18.postimage.org/onwkihwt5/Screen_Shot_2013_03_19_at_10_54_56_AM.png)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011163746im_/http:/s22.postimage.org/bfv43yiwh/Screen_Shot_2013_03_19_at_11_58_17_AM.png)

Thanks in advance! I'd also be interested in finding a very similar light typeface that doesn't have such a unique R, but other similar characteristics.

Cheers!
author: EricBenjamin

comments.content:
Wasn't able to spot a match. the closest I have is [Novel Sans Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011163746/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/atlas-font-foundry/novel-sans-pro) but definitely not matching. Try asking [Supergiant Games](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011163746/http:/supergiantgames.com/?page_id=3), they may answer (and if they do, drop the answer here).
